```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# setwd("docs/cv/") # for testing
source("functions.R")
library(dplyr, quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(readr, quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
# Calculate totals...
papers = read_csv("publications.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
counts = papers %>% 
   group_by(type) %>% 
   summarize(count = n()) %>%
   with(setNames(count, type)) %>% as.list()
```

**Dr. Timothy Fraser** {#title}

- I develop software & methods to *help communities combat climate change.*
- I published `r counts$paper` peer-reviewed studies, plus dashboards, R packages, and other software, using big data analytics, networks, GIS, and AI.

- Current Work: Dashboards for visualizing local emissions from transportation.
